item.title: 10.2. gist interface
item.description: Gistã‚¤ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒ•ã‚§ã‚¤ã‚¹ ãƒªã‚¹ãƒˆç®¡ç†ãªã©ã‚‚ã§ãã‚‹ gist.el ã¨ã„ã†ãƒ‘ãƒƒã‚±ãƒ¼ã‚¸ã‚’ä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã—ãŸãŒã€ãã‚‚ãã‚‚ãƒ­ãƒ¼ã‚«ãƒ«ã§ç®¡ç†ã™ã‚‹å¿…è¦ãŒãªã„ã‹ã‚‰ Gistã‚’ä½¿ã†ã®ã ã¨æ€ã†ã®ã§ post å°‚ç”¨ã®ç°¡å˜ãªé–¢æ•°ã‚’ä½œã‚Šã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ gist ã‚’installã—ã¦ãŠãå¿…è¦ãŒã‚ã‚Šã¾ã™ã€‚ $ sudo apt install gist ã‚¿ãƒ¼ãƒŸãƒŠãƒ«ã§ gist --help ã¨æ‰“ã¤ã¨æ²¢å±±ã®èµ·å‹•ã‚ªãƒ—ã‚·ãƒ§ãƒ³ãŒè¡¨ç¤ºã•ã‚Œã‚‹ã€‚ gist -o ã§ãƒã‚¹ãƒˆå¾Œã®çµæœã® URLã‚’ãƒ–ãƒ©ã‚¦ã‚¶ã§é–‹ã„ã¦ãã‚Œã‚‹ã®ã§ã“ã‚Œã‚’æ¡ç”¨ã—ãŸã€‚ (leaf *gist-configurations :bind ("s-g" . gist-region-or-buffer) :init (defun gist-description () "Add gist description." (code-quote-argument (read-from-minibuffer "Add gist description: "))) (defun gist-filename () "The character string entered in minibuffer is used as file-name. If enter is pressed without file-name, that's will be buffer-file-neme." (interactive) (let ((file (file-name-nondirectory (buffer-file-name (current-buffer))))) (read-from-minibuffer (format "File name (%s): " file) file))) (defun gist-region-or-buffer () "If region is selected, post from the region.

item.title: 10.8. counsel-tramp
item.description: [counsel-tramp.el] ğŸ”— masasam/emacs-counsel-tramp: Tramp ivy interface for ssh and docker and â€vagrant. ç®¡ç†ã—ã¦ã„ã‚‹ä¿³å¥ã‚µã‚¤ãƒˆã®ãƒ¬ãƒ³ã‚¿ãƒ«ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼xsrverã‚’ãƒãƒ©è¦‹ã™ã‚‹ã®ã«ä½¿ã£ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ ã‚µãƒ¼ãƒãƒ¼ä¸Šã®ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’ç›´æ¥ç·¨é›†ã™ã‚‹ã¨ã„ã†ã®ã¯ã¾ãšãªã„ã®ã§ã™ãŒã€ã†ã£ã‹ã‚Šæ‰‹å…ƒãŒæ»‘ã£ã¦é‡è¦ãªãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’è§¦ã£ã¦ã—ã¾ã‚ãªã„ã‚ˆã†ã« view-mode ã§é–‹ãã‚ˆã†ã«ã—ã¦ã„ã¾ã™ã€‚ (leaf counsel-tramp :ensure t :hook (find-file-hook . my:auto-view) :custom `((tramp-persistency-file-name . ,"~/.emacs.d/tmp/tramp") (tramp-default-method . "scp") (counsel-tramp-custom-connections . '(/scp:xsrv:/home/minorugh/gospel-haiku.com/public_html/))) :config (add-to-list 'my:auto-view-dirs "/scp:xsrv:/home/minorugh/") (defun my:auto-view () "Open a file with view mode." (when (file-exists-p buffer-file-name) (when (and my:auto-view-regexp (string-match my:auto-view-regexp buffer-file-name)) (view-mode 1)) (dolist (dir my:auto-view-dirs) (when (eq 0 (string-match (expand-file-name dir) buffer-file-name)) (view-mode 1))))) (defun my:tramp-quit () "Quit tramp, if tramp connencted.

item.title: 10.10. open-junk-file
item.description: [open-junk-file.el] ä½¿ã„æ¨ã¦ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’æ›¸ãã€é–‹ã ğŸ”— rubikitch/open-junk-file: Write a disposable file. ãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã¯ howmãƒ•ã‚©ãƒ«ãƒ€ãƒ¼ ~/Dropbox/howm/junk/ ã«ä¿å­˜ã—ã¾ã™ã€‚ ãã†ã™ã‚‹ã“ã¨ã§ howm ã®æ¤œç´¢æ©Ÿèƒ½ãŒåˆ©ç”¨ã§ãã€ ãƒ­ãƒ¼ãƒå­—ï¼ˆmigemoï¼‰ã§ã®æ—¥æœ¬èªæ¤œç´¢ã‚‚å¯èƒ½ã«ãªã‚‹ã®ã§ã¨ã¦ã‚‚ä¾¿åˆ©ã§ã™ã€‚ (leaf open-junk-file :ensure t :config (setq open-junk-file-format "~/Dropbox/howm/junk/%Y%m%d.") (setq open-junk-file-find-file-function 'find-file)) ç›´è¿‘ã® junkãƒ•ã‚¡ã‚¤ãƒ«ã‚’å³é–‹ã‘ã‚‹ã‚ˆã†ã« open-last-junk-file ã‚’å®šç¾©ã—ã¾ã—ãŸã€‚ (leaf em-glob :require t :config (defvar junk-file-dir "~/Dropbox/howm/junk/") (defun open-last-junk-file () "Open last created junk-file." (interactive) (find-file (car (last (eelisp-extended-glob (concat (file-name-as-directory junk-file-dir) "*.*.*")))))))
